mapper.select: select c.idx,a.fname as appe,s.fname as soup,m.fname as main,si.fname as side,de.fname as des, dr.fname as drink,c.tot_pri,c.course_name,c.show from course c INNER JOIN food a on c.appe=a.idx INNER JOIN food s on c.soup=s.idx INNER JOIN food m on c.main=m.idx INNER JOIN food si on c.side=si.idx INNER JOIN food de on c.des=de.idx INNER JOIN food dr on c.drink=dr.idx order by course_name

select c.idx,c.tot_pri,c.show,a.fname as appe,s.fname as soup,m.fname as main,si.fname as side,de.fname as des, dr.fname as drink from course c INNER JOIN food a on c.appe=a.idx INNER JOIN food s on c.soup=s.idx INNER JOIN food m on c.main=m.idx INNER JOIN food si on c.side=si.idx INNER JOIN food de on c.des=de.idx INNER JOIN food dr on c.drink=dr.idx where c.idx=#{idx}

select c.idx,c.show,c.course_name,c.appe,c.soup,c.main,c.side,c.des,c.drink, a.fname as appe_n,s.fname as soup_n,m.fname as main_n,si.fname as side_n,de.fname as des_n,dr.fname as drink_n, a.price as appe_p,s.price as soup,si.price as side_p,m.price as main_p,de.price as des_p,dr.price as drink_p,c.tot_pri from course c INNER JOIN food a on c.appe=a.idx INNER JOIN food s on c.soup=s.idx INNER JOIN food m on c.main=m.idx INNER JOIN food si on c.side=si.idx INNER JOIN food de on c.des=de.idx INNER JOIN food dr on c.drink=dr.idx where c.idx=#{idx}
mapper.update: update course set appe=#{appe}, soup=#{soup}, main=#{main}, side=#{side}, des=#{des}, drink=#{drink}, tot_pri=#{tot_pri}, course_name=#{course_name},show=#{show} where idx=#{idx}
